fixes.name: WATM(d) T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator = SUMX(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DTM]
)
VAR Denominator = SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])
RETURN
Numerator / Denominator
fixes.solution_explanation: SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]*[DTM]) in Tableau is a row-level product summed across rows, which maps to SUMX(table, table[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] * table[DTM]) in DAX. Column references were converted to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. The denominator remains SUM of the same field. The expression is a measure because it uses aggregation (SUM/SUMX).
